title: Bitcoin Faces Key Support Test After Fed Meeting—Will Powell Trigger a Breakout?
description: The Bitcoin Fed meeting verdict is in. The Federal Reserve held rates steady at 3.5% to 3.75% on January 28, 2026, and Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) now faces a critical support test. The Bitcoin price is consolidating near key support levels, with volatility compressing in a way that often precedes sharp moves in either direction. Powell ... Bitcoin Faces Key Support Test After Fed Meeting—Will Powell Trigger a Breakout?The post Bitcoin Faces Key Support Test After Fed Meeting—Will Powell Trigger a Breakout? appeared first on 24/7 Wall St..
